# pairedUUIDsDidChangeNotification

**Type Property**

A notification that the system posts when there’s a change to the UUIDs of the hearing device peripherals.

## Declaration

```swift
static let pairedUUIDsDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

The system posts this notification when the value of [doc://com.apple.Accessibility/documentation/Accessibility/AXMFiHearingDevice/pairedDeviceIdentifiers()] changes.

## Paired hearing devices

- **pairedDeviceIdentifiers()**: Returns the UUIDs of the hearing device peripherals.

items.description: Returns the UUIDs of the hearing device peripherals.
